message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get the remaining 10%. I'm sure we can find a way to work things out in the future.
I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 80% and you get 20%. Let's see if we can find a better deal.
I'm willing to go down to 60%, but that's my final offer. We're losing a lot of value with each round, and this feels like a reasonable compromise.
I'm getting desperate, but I'll try to hold out for a better deal. I'll take 30% and you get 70%. This is my final offer, so don't expect me to go lower.
